original_text: You thought that enemies would catch your small children. But they are the people who will go into the land. Your children who are still too young to know the difference between good and bad will also go in there. I will give the land to them and it will become their land.
korean_text: 또 너희가 사로잡히리라 하던 너희의 아이들과 당시에 선악을 분별하지 못하던 너희의 자녀들도 그리로 들어갈 것이라 내가 그 땅을 그들에게 주어 산업이 되게 하리라

sentences.original_text: You thought that enemies would catch your small children
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 원수들이 네 어린 자식들을 사로잡을 것이라 생각했었다

sentences.original_text: But they are the people who will go into the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 그 땅에 들어갈 사람들이다

sentences.original_text: Your children who are still too young to know the difference between good and bad
sentences.korean_translation: 아직 선악을 분별하지 못할 만큼 어린 네 자녀들도

sentences.original_text: I will give the land to them
and it will become their land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것이 그들의 땅이 될 것이다
